org.sakaiproject.coursemanagement.impl.provider

Interface RoleResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseRoleResolver, CourseOfferingRoleResolver, CourseSetRoleResolver, SectionRoleResolver

    public interface RoleResolver
    Resolves users roles in CM objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,String> getGroupRoles(CourseManagementService cmService, String userEid)
      Gets a single user's roles in all sections with which s/he is associated.
      Map<String,String> getUserRoles(CourseManagementService cmService, Section section)
      Gets users roles in a CM object.

    • Method Detail

      • getUserRoles

        Map<String,String> getUserRoles(CourseManagementService cmService,
                              Section section)
        Gets users roles in a CM object. A RoleResolver implementation will typically use the cmService to look "up" from the section in the CM hierarchy to find the object it's interested in, then find any membership roles associated with the user.
        Parameters:
        section - The section from which to start searching "up" the hierarchy, if necessary
        cmService - The CM service impl. We pass this in rather than injecting it into every RoleResolver
        Returns:
        The user's role, or null if the user has no role in this CM object

      • getGroupRoles

        Map<String,String> getGroupRoles(CourseManagementService cmService,
                               String userEid)
        Gets a single user's roles in all sections with which s/he is associated.
        Parameters:
        userEid - The user's enterprise ID
        cmService - The CM service impl. We pass this in rather than injecting it into every RoleResolver
        Returns:
        The user's roles, or null if the user has no role in this CM object
